00036 require_once('../lib/vars.php');
00037 require_once('../lib/view.php');
00038 
00039 class Snortips extends View
00040 {
00041     public $Model= 'snortips';
00042     public $Layout= 'snortips';
00043     
00044     function Snortips()
00045     {
00046         $this->LogsHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW("Here are the definitions of a few terms used in the logs:<ul class='nomargin'><li class='nomargin'>Blocking a host means adding it to IPS pf table as blocked</li><li class='nomargin'>Unblocking means deleting a blocked host from the table</li><li class='nomargin'>Deblocking means adding a whitelisted host to the table</li><li class='nomargin'>Undeblocking means deleting a whitelisted host from the table</li></ul>
00047         Failure to block a host does not necessarily indicate an error; the host may be in the table already.");
00048         
00049         $this->GraphHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('SnortIPS is a perl process. These graphs display data from all perl processes.');
00050         
00051         $this->ConfHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('The IDS produces many alerts. Some alerts may be more serious than others, hence most alerts have priorities. You can configure the IPS to block only alerts at a certain priority and up. Each alert also contains log and classification text. You can add keywords to match within such text. The IP in the matching alert is blocked. If the alert does not contain an IP address, no action is taken.');
00052     
00053         $this->Config = array(
00054             'Priority' => array(
00055                 'title' => _TITLE2('Priority'),
00056                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('This is the priority in the alerts. Alerts at this priority and up will be used to block IPs.'),
00057                 ),
00058             'BlockDuration' => array(
00059                 'title' => _TITLE2('Block Duration'),
00060                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Temporary block duration in seconds on each alert.'),
00061                 ),
00062             'MaxBlockDuration' => array(
00063                 'title' => _TITLE2('Max Block Duration'),
00064                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Total of block extensions cannot be higher than this value.'),
00065                 ),
00066         );
00067     }
00068 
00074     function PrintLogLine($cols, $linenum)
00075     {
00076         $this->PrintLogLineClass($cols['Log']);
00077 
00078         PrintLogCols($linenum, $cols);
00079         echo '</tr>';
00080     }

00088     function PrintListedIPsForm($list, $title, $helpmsg)
00089     {
00090         global $Row;
00091 
00092         $class= $Row++ % 2 == 0 ? 'evenline' : 'oddline';
00093         ?>
00094         <tr class="<?php echo $class ?>">
00095             <td class="title">
00096                 <?php echo $title.':' ?>
00097             </td>
00098             <td>
00099                 <?php
00100                 $cmd= $list == 'whitelist' ? 'GetAllowedIps' : 'GetRestrictedIps';
00101                 $this->Controller($ips, $cmd);
00104                 ?>
00105                 <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00106                     <input style="display:none;" type="submit" name="Add" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Add') ?>"/>
00107                     <select name="IPs[]" multiple style="width: 200px; height: 100px;">
00108                         <?php
00109                         foreach ($ips as $ip) {
00110                             ?>
00111                             <option value="<?php echo $ip ?>"><?php echo $ip ?></option>
00112                             <?php
00113                         }
00114                         ?>
00115                     </select>
00116                     <input type="submit" name="Delete" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Delete') ?>"/><br />
00117                     <input type="text" name="IPToAdd" style="width: 200px;" maxlength="18"/>
00118                     <input type="submit" name="Add" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Add') ?>"/>
00119                     <input type="hidden" name="List" value="<?php echo $list ?>" />
00120                 </form>
00121             </td>
00122             <td class="none">
00123                 <?php
00124                 PrintHelpBox($helpmsg);
00125                 ?>
00126             </td>
00127         </tr>
00128         <?php
00129     }

00135     function PrintBlockedIPsForm()
00136     {
00137         global $ADMIN;
00138         ?>
00139         <td>
00140             <?php
00142             if ($this->Controller($output, 'GetInfo')) {
00143                 $info= unserialize($output[0]);
00144 
00145                 $blocked= count($info['Blocked']);
00146                 $whitelisted= count($info['Whitelisted']);
00147                 $blacklisted= count($info['Blacklisted']);
00148                 $managed= $whitelisted + $blocked + $blacklisted;
00149 
00150                 echo $managed.' '._TITLE2('managed').': '.$whitelisted.' '._TITLE2('whitelisted').', '.$blocked.' '._TITLE2('blocked').', '.$blacklisted.' '._TITLE2('blacklisted');
00151                 ?>
00152                 <table id="ipsmanaged">
00153                     <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00154                         <tr>
00155                             <th><?php echo _TITLE2('Host') ?></th>
00156                             <th><?php echo _TITLE2('Time to expire (secs)') ?></th>
00157                         </tr>
00158                         <?php
00159                         foreach ($info['Whitelisted'] as $host) {
00160                             ?>
00161                             <tr class="whitelisted">
00162                                 <td>
00163                                     <?php echo $host ?>
00164                                 </td>
00165                                 <td>
00166                                     <?php echo _TITLE2('Whitelisted') ?>
00167                                 </td>
00168                             </tr>
00169                             <?php
00170                         }
00171 
00172                         foreach ($info['Blacklisted'] as $host) {
00173                             ?>
00174                             <tr class="blacklisted">
00175                                 <td>
00176                                     <?php echo $host ?>
00177                                 </td>
00178                                 <td>
00179                                     <?php echo _TITLE2('Blacklisted') ?>
00180                                 </td>
00181                             </tr>
00182                             <?php
00183                         }
00184 
00185                         foreach ($info['Blocked'] as $host => $time) {
00186                             ?>
00187                             <tr class="blocked">
00188                                 <td>
00189                                     <?php
00191                                     if (in_array($_SESSION['USER'], $ADMIN)) {
00192                                         ?>
00193                                         <input name="ItemsToDelete[]" type="checkbox" value="<?php echo $host ?>"/><?php echo $host ?>
00194                                         <?php
00195                                     }
00196                                     else {
00197                                         ?>
00198                                         <?php echo $host ?>
00199                                         <?php
00200                                     }
00201                                     ?>
00202                                 </td>
00203                                 <td>
00204                                     <?php echo $time ?>
00205                                 </td>
00206                             </tr>
00207                             <?php
00208                         }
00210                         if (in_array($_SESSION['USER'], $ADMIN)) {
00211                             ?>
00212                             <tr>
00213                                 <td>
00214                                     <input type="submit" name="Unblock" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Unblock') ?>"/><br />
00215                                     <?php echo _TITLE2('Unblock selected') ?>
00216                                 </td>
00217                                 <td>
00218                                     <input type="submit" name="UnblockAll" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Unblock All') ?>"/><br />
00219                                     <?php echo _TITLE2('Unblock all blocked entries') ?>
00220                                 </td>
00221                             </tr>
00222                             <?php
00223                         }
00224                         ?>
00225                     </form>
00226                 </table>
00227                 <?php
00229                 if (in_array($_SESSION['USER'], $ADMIN)) {
00230                     ?>
00231                     <br />
00232                     <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00233                         <?php echo _TITLE2('IP or Net').':' ?>
00234                         <input type="text" name="ItemToAdd" style="width: 100px;" maxlength="20"/>
00235                         <?php echo _TITLE2('Time to expire').':' ?>
00236                         <input type="text" name="TimeToAdd" style="width: 100px;" maxlength="20"/>
00237                         <?php echo _TITLE('secs') ?>
00238                         <input type="submit" name="Block" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Block') ?>" />
00239                     </form>
00240                     <?php
00241                 }
00242             }
00243             ?>
00244         </td>
00245         <?php
00246     }
